doc:
Blue Washington https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Washington 0 Edgar "Blue" Washington (12 February 1898 – 15 September 1970), was an American actor and played for a few years as a pitcher and first baseman in the Negro Leagues for the Chicago American Giants and the Kansas City Monarchs. He appeared in 74 films between 1919 and 1957. In the 1933 film Haunted Gold, he portrays Clarence, a comic sidekick, with John Wayne. Edgar_"_Blue_"_Washington ( 12_February_1898 – 15_September_1970 ) , was an_American_actor and played for a_few_years as a_pitcher_and_first_baseman in the_Negro_Leagues for the_Chicago_American_Giants and the_Kansas_City_Monarchs . He appeared in 74_films between 1919_and_1957 . In the_1933_film Haunted Gold , he portrays Clarence , a_comic_sidekick , with John_Wayne .
